name: LD #44 Particle Overload
description:
A weekend LD44 project: 
Play any of your music and enjoy the reactive environment. Collect points while being pushed around. NOTE: For best experience, decrease game's audio via windows panel and increase audio in-game.

There is a default music track (royalty-free, but not mine sadly) included, but click "load" and then "play" to enjoy your own music.

- "WASD" to move.
- Sit on the music pad if you just want to listen to music and not play the game!
- Getting off the music pad starts reducing your "music" power. increase this by getting the green boosters.
- Avoid red boosters, which the minions are trying to push you in to. 

Feel free to leave feedback :)
